message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $20,000. I'm confident it can greatly benefit you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I see the value in this product, $20,000 is unfortunately outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Let's see if we can make this work.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I value your offer, $12,000 is quite a bit below my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Alice, I appreciate you being flexible.  $16,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $14,000.  This is my final offer before I explore other options.
Bob, I appreciate you coming up on the price.  It seems we are getting close. How about we split the difference and make it $15,000? This is my final offer.
